description:
Make your own story. User-friendly software for LLM roleplaying

RisuAI, or Risu for short, is a cross platform AI chatting software / web application with powerful features such as multiple API support, assets in the chat, regex functions and much more.
- feat: Use Segmented Controls for Claude thinking parameters
- feat: Implement infinite scroll for inlay explorer
- fix: fixed addProvider hijacking vulnerability via mode. (v3 breaking)
  - This will limit mode to v3
  - The v2.1 api isn't yet blocked, considering its widely used and its scheduled for removal
- fix: fixed risuai server auth access vulnerability (v3 breaking)
- fix: apply Content-Type header on Google Cloud requests when streaming is disabled
